word_mean: 幽门：胃的远端开口，外包强大的环肌，胃内容经此开口排入十二指肠。该词有多种用法，可指胃的幽门部、幽门窦、幽门管、幽门口和幽门括约肌

sentence.Network_en: The pylorus may be palpated as a thick ring of muscle.
sentence.Network_cn: 可扪诊幽门如增厚的肌肉环.

sentence.Network_en: Objective: To provide anatomic data for pylorus - preserving pancreaticoduodenectomy ( PPPD ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 为保留幽门的 胰 十二指肠切除术提供解剖学基础.

sentence.Network_en: Follow up panendoscopy 4 months later showed gastric ulcer with double pylorus.
sentence.Network_cn: 四个月后之追踪内视镜检查显示胃溃疡并双幽门.
